alert.note: Alert for Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:24PM CDT until May 14 at 5:17AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau Mississippi River at Thebes ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY, MAY 14... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Thebes. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Saturday, May 14. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 29.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning to a crest of 36.5 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, May 13. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
